Optimus landed on the coast of Spain.

Optimus: I am Optimus Fury, future leader of the Malacons (ahh the 
plot thickens when he says future he means he isn't yet not he is in 
the future). I will join your group assuming you will all be 
reformatted to a technorganic state, and take a beast mode if you 
don't already have one.

OOC: I'd probably still have hime join whether his demands are met or 
not. As for him being all knowing his presents will probably have some 
effect on history, and he's a warrior not a history buff anyway.
